actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide out-patient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 60 percent or more.

summary.text: Extends outpatient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated 60 percent or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide out-patient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 60 percent or more.
